solution_line_template: Tommy ordered {apples_kg} + {grapes_kg} + {orange_kg} = <<{apples_kg}+{grapes_kg}+{orange_kg}={non_strawberry_kg}>>{non_strawberry_kg} kilograms of apples, oranges and grapes altogether.
Therefore, Tommy ordered {total_kg} - {non_strawberry_kg} = <<{total_kg}-{non_strawberry_kg}={strawberries_kg}>>{strawberries_kg} kilograms of strawberries.
